pr_title: refactor: clarify the position code + prepare field position change.

timeline.bodyText: Not sure it is a good idea to make the position mutable. I think we paid attention in the past to keep them unmutable.
timeline.author: tdurieux

replies.bodyText: I agree, immutability is such a good property. I'll change this.
replies.author: monperrus
